meanings.definition: A salt or ester of chromic acid containing the chromate ion CrO4^2-
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of chromate in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: The chromate was used as a pigment in the paint to give it a yellow color.
meanings.sent3: The chromate ion decided to throw a party for all the other ions in the solution.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a chromate ion under a microscope.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with hues reminiscent of a chromate compound.

meanings.definition: To treat with a chromate or a chromic compound
meanings.sent1: The mechanic will chromate the metal parts to prevent rusting.
meanings.sent2: She decided to chromate the wood to give it a shiny finish.
meanings.sent3: The chef chromated the vegetables with a special solution for a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to chromate the atmosphere with tension.
meanings.sent5: The artist chromated the canvas with vibrant colors, creating a masterpiece.
